title: Type For You
content:
it is little industrial, little vintage, little condensed, little bold.  
Public Gothic is our new font family and beta release is free to use in all your designs, commercial or non commercial.

PB family members are PB Square, PB Vintage, PB Circular, PB Federal.  
It's compatible with any os system. (Mac T1, Win OTF)

Download at:  
 [http://www.a2591.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415052307/http:/www.a2591.com/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415052307im_/http:/typophile.com/files/T01_4895.jpg)

author: antrepo

comments.content:
Thank you for sharing.

If you allow two comments:  
- The figure 1 is somewhat ambiguous. In the London Berlin baggage labels I was not sure whether to read 1 or 7. It only becomes clear when you have a 7 to compare.

- The R looks unbalanced to me. I'd prefer the counter like in B (not in P).

Andreas

Nice! I just downloaded.

Thank you!
